Package controller

package controller
  • Class
    Description
    Command
    Represents a command.
    CommandAddDeliveryRequest
    This class represents the command to add a delivery request to a tour.
    CommandList
    This class represents a list of commands that can be executed, undone, redone, and reset.
    CommandRemoveDeliveryRequest
    This class represents the command to remove a delivery request from a tour.
    Controller
    The Controller class manages the application's logic.
    DefaultState
    This class provides default implementations for the State interface methods.
    State
    This interface defines the various states and their behaviors for the controller.
    StateAddDeliveryRequestToComputedTour
    This class represents the state when a delivery requests is being added to a tour that has already been computed at least once.
    StateComputeBestTour
    This class represents the state when we compute the best tour
    StateCourierManagement
    This class represents the state for managing the courier.
    StateGenerateRoadMap
    This class represents the state when we generate a road map
    StateInitializeTour
    This class represents the state when we assign a delivery request to a tour.
    StateLoadCityMap
    This class represents the state when the city map is being loaded.
    StateLoadDeliveryRequests
    This class represents the state when the delivery requests are being loaded.
    StateManageDeliveryRequests
    This class represents the state for creating delivery requests.
    StateRemoveDeliveryRequestToComputedTour
    This class represents the state when a delivery request is being removed from a tour that has already been computed at least once.
